verses.verse: <S%H8199>Vindicate<s%> me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7378>plead<s%> my <S%H7379>case<s%> <S%H4480>against<s%> an <S%H2623>ungodly<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1471>nation;<s%> O <S%H6403>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> and <S%H9390>unjust<s%> <S%H376>man!<s%>

For Thou art the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H4581>strength;<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> hast Thou <S%H2186>rejected<s%> me? <S%H4100>Why<s%> do I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H340>enemy<s%>?

O <S%H7971>send<s%> out Thy <S%H216>light<s%> and Thy <S%H571>truth,<s%> let them <S%H5148>lead<s%> me; Let them <S%H935>bring<s%> me to Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill,<s%> And to Thy <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>places.<s%>

Then I will <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> To <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H8057>exceeding<s%> <S%H8057>joy;<s%> And upon the <S%H3658>lyre<s%> I shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> Thee, O <S%H430>God,<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> are you in <S%H7817>despair,<s%> O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? And <S%H4100>why<s%> are you <S%H1993>disturbed<s%> <S%H5921>within<s%> me? <S%H3176>Hope<s%> in <S%H430>God,<s%> for I shall <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> Him, The <S%H3444>help<s%> of my <S%H6440>countenance,<s%> and my <S%H430>God.<s%>
